formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \theta_1 = \arctan2(y, x) - \arccos\left(\frac{x^2 + y^2 + L_1^2 - L_2^2}{2 \cdot L_1 \cdot \sqrt{x^2 + y^2}}\right)
formulas.raw: \theta_1 = \arctan2(y, x) - \arccos\left(\frac{x^2 + y^2 + L_1^2 - L_2^2}{2 \cdot L_1 \cdot \sqrt{x^2 + y^2}}\right)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: To calculate the joint angles for a 2R manipulator: \[\theta_1 = \arctan2(y, x) - \arccos\left(\frac{x^2 + y^2 + L_1^2 - L_2^2}{2 \cdot L_1 \cdot \sqrt{x^2 + y^2}}\right)\] \[\theta_2 = \arccos\left(\frac{x^2 + y^2 - L_1^2 - L_2^2}{2 \cdot L_1 \cdot L_2}\right)\]

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
